result.execSummary:
The defendant Dominique M Mendoza was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of synthetic cannabinoid, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(em).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants payment plan of $50 per month beginning October 1, 2016. Failure to pay will result in one day in jail for every $25 outstanding.
Defendant must submit DNA sample within 30 days.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Dominique M Mendoza in court with attorney Robert Buckett.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Plea questionnaire filed. Court examines defendant, accepts guilty plea and finds defendant guilty. Court renders sentence.
Notice of Hearing-Plea/sentencing hearing: Dominique M Mendoza
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 1, 2016 moved to September 8 at 8:30 am at the request of District Attorney's office. Clerk confirmed counsel's availability for said date.
Notice of Hearing-Plea/sentencing hearing: Dominique M Mendoza

Defendant Dominique M Mendoza in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises the defendant to speak with their attorney in regards to rescheduling of previously scheduled Plea and Sentencing.  Court orders warrant lifted.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Robert Buckett in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant does not appear.  Counsel requests court stay a warrant until the defendants next appearance.  Court orders warrant but stays its issuance until 4pm today.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Dominique M Mendoza in court.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Rachel Boaz appears in court. Defendant Dominique M Mendoza in court.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews case history. Case will be recalled once defendant has a chance to speak with public defender.

w/conditions: Absolute sobriety, no controlled substances/prescription medication unless prescribed

Defendant Dominique M Mendoza not in court. Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court received message from defendant stating she was running late however defendant not here.
